thread.title: Halima Aden Interviewed By Iman for CR Fashion Book - Halima Aden Hijab-Wearing Model Lands Cover of CR Fashion Book
thread.title_full: Halima Aden Interviewed By Iman for CR Fashion Book - Halima Aden Hijab-Wearing Model Lands Cover of CR Fashion Book

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Halima Aden Interviewed By Iman for CR Fashion Book - Halima Aden Hijab-Wearing Model Lands Cover of CR Fashion Book
text: Just three months since becoming the first Miss USA contestant to compete while wearing a hijab, Halima Aden made her big modeling debut walking the Yeezy Season 5 show at New York Fashion Week. Now, the young Muslim model is continuing to make waves in the fashion world with her first magazine cover, for Issue 10 of CR Fashion Book . Aden competing in the Miss Minnesota pageant, November 2016. Twitter
